ygData.subject: Rathe event
ygData.msgSnippet: As many of you know tonights event on the Rathe server was a joke.  Frame rate was so bad I couldn t really move, decided to try to leave got blinded and next
ygData.messageBody:
As many of you know tonights event on the Rathe server was a joke. Frame
rate was so bad I couldn't really move, decided to try to leave got blinded
and next thing I know I was killed. Went looking for corpse got killed
again by new monsters they added to the zone. Found corpse looted it and
with in 5 mins if that the server disconnected on me for like that 5th time
in 10 mins. Was in chat room too hear someone say if you had anything on
your corpses it was all gone, heard like up too 100 ppl lost EVERYTHING but
not 100% sure on how many ppl it was. Many were saying if they didn't get
things back they'd never play EQ again. Also was told if you got killed in
a GM event you'd lose no exp but yet I did. Tonight wasn't a good time for
Verant to mess up with Asheron's Call coming out on Tuesday. I did hear in
the chat room before logging that GM's were replacing lost items but who
knows for sure about that.

***************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 24 Human Cleric of The Rathe
***************************
